source.sqlReaderQuery: select * from SalesLT.Customer where customerid>100 and customerid<1000
select count(*) as totalCustomerCount from Saleslt.customer
select DateModified from highwatermark where tablename='saleslt.customer'
select max(ModifiedDate) as  latestDate from saleslt.customer

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from saleslt.customer_refresh where modifieddate>'@{
    activity('HighWaterMark').output.firstRow.DateModified}'and modifieddate<= '@{activity('CustomerTableDatemodified').output.firstRow.latestDate}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select Concat(c.FirstName,c.MiddleName,c.LastName) as Name,
a.addressline1,a.addressline2,a.city,a.stateprovince,a.countryRegion,a.PostalCode
 from [SalesLT].[Customer] c 
left outer join [SalesLT].[CustomerAddress] ca on c.customerid=ca.customerid
inner join [SalesLT].[Address] a on a.addressid=ca.addressid
Select count(1) as productCount  from Saleslt.Product
